system.description:
Cantrips: Altered Strike, Calculate, Druidcraft, Guidance, Mage Hand, Message, Minor Illusion, Mending, Pestilence, Prestidigitation, Produce Flame, Ray of Frost, Shillelagh, Shocking Grasp

1st Level Essential: Comprehend Languages, Cure Wounds, Detect Magic, Detect Poison and Disease, Earth Barrier, Faerie Fire, Feather Fall, Find Familiar, Floating Disk, Fog Cloud, Identify, Illusory Script, Longstrider, Protection from Evil and Good, Purify Food and Drink 

1st Level Extended: Alarm, Animal Friendship, Arcane Riposte, Burning Hands, Charm Person, Color Spray, Disguise Self, Entangle, Expeditious Retreat, False Life Force Punch, Goodberry, Grease, Healing Word, Hideous Laughter, Jump, Mage Armor, Magic Missile, Sanctuary, Searing Equation, Shield, Silent Image, Sleep, Speak with Animals, Thunderwave, Traveler’s Ward, Unseen Servant, Wind Up

2nd Level Essential: Arcanist’s Magic Aura, Darkvision, Detect Thoughts, Enhance Ability, Find Traps, Gust of Wind, Lesser Restoration, Locate Animals or Plants, Locate Object, Misty Step, Protection From Energy, Protection from Poison, See Invisibility, Spider Climb

2nd Level Extended: Acid Arrow, Alter Self, Animal Messenger, Arcane Lock, Barkskin, Blindness/Deafness, Blur, Darkness, Deadweight, Enlarge/Reduce, Flame Blade, Flaming Sphere, Force of Will, Gentle Repose, Heat Metal, Hold Person, Invigorated Strikes, Invisibility, Knock, Levitate, Magic Mouth, Magic Weapon, Mental Grip, Mirror Image, Moonbeam, Pass Without Trace, Ray of Enfeeblement, Rope Trick, Scorching Ray, Seed Bomb, Shatter, Shattering Barrage, Sleet Storm, Soulwrought Fists, Spike Growth, Suggestion, Web

3rd Level Essential: Beacon of Hope, Blink, Clairvoyance, Counterspell, Daylight, Dispel Magic, Fly, Gaseous Form, Magic Circle, Nondetection, Phantom Steed, Plant Growth, Remove Curse, Sending, Speak with Plants,Tongues, Venomous Succor, Water Breathing 

3rd Level Extended: Bestow Curse, Call Lightning, Cobra’s Spit, Conjure Animals, Darklight, Fireball, Glyph of Warding, Haste, Hypnotic Pattern, Lightning Bolt, Major Image, Meld into Stone, Poison Skin, Slow, Stinking Cloud,Tiny Hut, Vampiric Touch, Water Walk, Whirlwind Kick, Wind Wall

4th Level Essential: Arcane Eye, Control Water, Dimension Door, Fabricate, Faithful Hound, Freedom of Movement, Locate Creature, Mindshield, Private Sanctum, Stone Shape

4th Level Extended: Banishment, Blight, Charm Monster, Confusion, Conjure Minor Elementals, Conjure Woodland Beings, Dominate Beast, Giant Insect, Greater Invisibility, Hallucinatory Terrain, Ice Storm, Phantasmal Killer, Polymorph, Private Sanctum, Rage of the Meek, Resilient Sphere, Secret Chest, Stoneskin, Wall of Fire
